data.name: WIC Neckere Expedition
data.desc: WIC sends Jonathan de Neckere to reinforce WIC Booneter Expedition, but does not manage to meet with Booneter, and goes on his own against Sp
data.locn: Olinda, Barbados, St. Vincent, Ile a Vache, Santa Marta
data.agents_nsp0: Jonathan de Neckere, Cornelis Corneliszoon Jol 1 Ship 2 Yachts
data.note: Neckere returns to Netherlands mid-Sep 1631, Jol in the yacht Otter returns half a year later /v Goslinga 221
